name: Buffalo Chicken Cheese Dip with Wonder Bread Fingers
author: Anonymous
summary: You can feel good about serving this meal. Because now, just two slices of Wonder Classic White Sandwich Bread have as much calcium as an eight ounce glass of milk. And that means, these Wonder Bread Fingers will not only taste good, they'll help your family feel good, too.
ingredients: 6 slices Wonder® Classic White Sandwich Bread, crusts removed
1 (8 ounce) package fat-free cream cheese, softened
1 (9.75 ounce) can white chunk chicken breast, drained and flaked with fork
directions: Cut slice of bread into four strips
Bake for 6 minutes turn and continue to bake for 5 to 7 minutes or until toasted and crisp; set aside
Combine cream cheese, sour cream, wing sauce, chicken and Cheddar cheese
Spoon into a 1 1/2-quart baking dish that has been sprayed with nonstick spray coating
Bake 30 minutes or until hot through
Serve hot with toasted Wonder Bread strips
